Data Deletion Instructions

Last Updated: September 17, 2025

Your Data Rights

At Instagram Sentiment Analysis, we respect your privacy and your right to control your personal data. You have the right to request deletion of your data at any time.

What Data We Collect

Our application may collect the following data when you use our service:

  • Facebook/Instagram account information (name, email, profile picture)
  • Instagram business account data (posts, captions, engagement metrics)
  • Comments and engagement data from your Instagram posts
  • Sentiment analysis results generated from your content
  • Usage analytics and application logs

How to Request Data Deletion

Important: Most data processing happens in real-time and is not permanently stored on our servers. However, you can request complete data deletion using the methods below.

Method 1: Automatic Deletion via Facebook

You can revoke our app's access to your Facebook/Instagram data directly through Facebook:

  1. Go to your Facebook App Settings
  2. Find "Instagram Sentiment Analysis" in your app list
  3. Click "Remove" to revoke all permissions
  4. This will automatically prevent any future data access

Method 2: Contact Us Directly

To request complete data deletion, please contact us:

Email: privacy@instagram-sentiment-app.com

Subject Line: Data Deletion Request

Please include in your request:

  • Your Facebook/Instagram username or email address
  • The approximate date you used our application
  • Specific data you want deleted (or request "all data")

Data Deletion Timeline

We will process your data deletion request within:

  • Immediate: Revocation of app permissions (Method 1)
  • 30 days: Complete data deletion from our systems (Method 2)
  • 90 days: Deletion from backup systems and logs

What Happens After Deletion

Once your data is deleted:

  • We will no longer have access to your Instagram/Facebook data
  • All sentiment analysis results will be permanently removed
  • You will need to re-authorize the app if you want to use it again
  • We will send you a confirmation email when deletion is complete

Data Retention Policy

By default, we do not store your personal data permanently. Most data is processed in real-time for sentiment analysis and discarded immediately. Any temporarily cached data is automatically deleted within 24 hours.

Contact Information

Data Protection Officer

Email: privacy@instagram-sentiment-app.com

Response Time: Within 48 hours

Questions or Concerns

If you have any questions about data deletion or our privacy practices, please don't hesitate to contact us using the information above. We're committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring your data rights are respected.
